This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at home sitting on my back patio watching the clouds. I noticed a dark object moving high in the sky that I thought was a very rapidly moving object or airplane. I started to watch it more closely with my binoculars set at 10x zoom. A dark-colored traditional disk shape moving from west to east fairly fast. The disk stopped and hovered (East North East of my location) as it changed shape slowly into a shiny ovoid (possibly turning over and over or shape shifting) and back and forth. The UFO then appeared to move out of range further to the east. Duration 2-3 minutes total. This was followed by a second silver disk shape appearing due east of me and near to a jet that was flying south to north. The UFO vanished. Duration 1-2 minutes total.
Summary: Dark Colored disk shape that changed into a shiny silver ovoid.
